Description
Fast Enemy labs change the stats of fast
enemies
during rounds. When labs are researched, the base modifiers between enemies will no longer be accurate (ex: Boss health will not always be x20 basic if basic health is researched).
Fast Enemy Health
Fast Enemy Attack
Fast Enemy Speed
Fast Enemy Health Research
Unlocked
lab
in
Milestones
at tier 9 wave 20. Decreases Fast enemy health at all waves. Has 30 levels.
Level
Time
Cost
Expand
Value
